item.title: Quickly editing waypoints on a Garmin GPS device
item.description: When we traveled by car in Spain and Portugal in 2007, it’s hard to believe that we managed to get around several cities using only a Michelin road atlas and a bunch of printouts of online maps. This time we’re fully embracing 21st-century technology and bringing along a GPS device. To help save time, I like to enter destinations or waypoints ahead of time. On my Garmin n√ºvi 255W, it’s a time-consuming process to enter waypoints (which Garmin calls Favorites).
